snippet: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl is expected to return to life as a regular Army soldier as early as Monday, Defense Department officials said late Sunday.
abstract: Defense Dept officials say Sgt Bowe Bergdahl is expected to return to life as regular Army soldier, six weeks after being released from five years in Taliban captivity.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl is expected to return to life as a regular Army soldier as early as Monday, Defense Department officials said late Sunday.

headline.main: Bergdahl Is Set to Resume Life on Active Duty
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Is Set to Resume Life on Active Duty

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
